title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8147.29 - Town of Brookhaven
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 § 8147.29 - Town of Brookhaven

State Regulations
(a) Commercial Boulevard, a town highway, between the R. B. Hamilton terminal and

Route 112 (SH 1018), a distance of 0.2± mile, is designated as an access
highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route
shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Route 112 (SH 1018), between Commercial

Boulevard and interchange 64 of Route 495 (SH 67-2), a distance of 1.0±
mile, is designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. (c) Patchogue-Holbrook Road, CR 19, a county road, between interchange 61 of IR 495
(SH 64-4) and Union Avenue/Long Island Avenue, a distance of 0.5± mile, is designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (d) Union Avenue/Long Island

Avenue. Union Avenue/Long Island Avenue between Patchogue-Holbrook Road, CR 19, and Waverly Avenue; provided, however, that this route shall only be used
between the hours of 7 p.m. to 7 a.m. (e) Long Island Avenue. Long Island Avenue
between Waverly Avenue and the Roadway Express facility, a distance of
0.4± mile. (f) Patchogue-Yaphank Road, CR 101. Patchogue-Yaphank Road, CR 101, between the

Long Island Expressway, IR 495 and Horse Block Road, CR 16. (g) [Eff. until Jan. 19, 1993, see also subd. (g) below.] Horse Block Road, CR 16. Horse Block Road, CR 16, between

Patchogue-Yaphank Road, CR 101, and the Roadway Services terminal, a distance
of 0.8± mile. (g) [Eff. Jan. 19, 1993, see also subd. (g) above.] Granny Road, eastbound only, between Route
112 and Mill Road. (h) Mill Road, northbound only, between Granny Road and Route 112. (i) CR 46. CR 46 (William Floyd Parkway)
between I-495 (exit 68) and CR 80 (Montauk Highway). (j) CR 80. CR 80 (Montauk Highway) between

William Floyd Parkway and Caldor Store, Shirley. (k) Ronkonkoma Avenue. Ronkondoma Avenue
between I-495 (exit 59A) and Caldor Store, Lake Ronkonkoma. (l) CR 83. CR 83 (Patchogue-Mount Sinai Road)
between I-495 (exit 63) and Route 25A. (m) Route 25A. Route 25A between CR 83
(Patchogue-Mount Sinai Road) and Caldor Store, Rocky Point. (n) Route 112. Route 112 between I-495 (exit
64) and CR 80 (Montauk Highway). (o) CR 80. CR 80 (Montauk Highway) between

Route 112 and Caldor Store, East Patchogue. (p) Route 112. Route 112 between Granny Road
and Mill Road/Caldor Store, Coram. (q) Route 27. Route 27 between CR 46 (William

Floyd Parkway) (exit 58) and Brookhaven-Southampton town line. (r) [Eff. until March 9, 1994, see also subd. (r) below.] Route 112 between Commercial Boulevard and Granny Road. (r) [Eff. March 9, 1994, see also subd. (r)
above.] CR 101. CR 101 (Patchogue-Yaphank Road) between I-495 (exit 66) and CR
80 (Montauk Highway). (s) McGraw

Street. McGraw Street from CR 46 (William Floyd Parkway) to its eastern
terminus. (z) CR 80 between CR 46
and Camp Upton Road. (aa)
CR 97
(Nicolls Road) between I-495 and Brookhaven/Islip town line. (ac)

Route 347 between New Moriches Road and

Pathmark Facility, Port Jefferson. (ad)

Route 25. Route 25 between CR 83 and

Route 112. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
§
8147.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
